TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PageHandlerFactory extends System.Object implements class System.Web.IHttpHandlerFactory

summary.span: 创建从 类继承并实现 接口的类的实例。

span.span: Creates instances of classes that inherit from the class and implement the interface.

summary.span: 实例被动态地创建以处理针对 ASP.NET 文件的请求。

span.span: Instances are created dynamically to handle requests for ASP.NET files.

summary.span: 类是 ASP.NET 页的默认处理程序工厂实现。

span.span: The class is the default handler factory implementation for ASP.NET pages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类实现 接口，为 ASP.NET 文件提供默认的 HTTP 处理程序。The class implements the interface to provide the default HTTP handler for ASP.NET files. 如有必要，将调用 ASP.NET 编译系统以进行编译，并返回与该 URL 对应的确切类型，然后创建该类型的实例。The calls the ASP.NET compilation system to compile, if necessary, and return the exact type corresponding to the URL, and then creates an instance of that type. 页类型从 类继承并实现 接口。The page type inherits from the class and implements the interface. 若要生成自定义页面处理程序工厂，请在 HttpHandlers 元素中实现并注册该 应用程序的 Web.config 文件中的自定义类 [ (ASP.NET 设置架构) ](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/bya7fh0a(v=vs.100)) 配置节。To build a custom page handler factory, implement the and register the custom class in the Web.config file for the application in the [httpHandlers Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/bya7fh0a(v=vs.100)) configuration section.

related.span: HTTP 处理程序和 HTTP 模块概述

span.span: HTTP Handlers and HTTP Modules Overview

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数是无参数构造函数并将所有字段初始化为其默认值。The constructor is the parameterless constructor and initializes any fields to their default values.

param.span: 类的实例，它提供对用于为 HTTP 请求提供服务的内部服务器对象（如 Request、Response、Session 和 Server）的引用。

span.span: An instance of the class that provides references to intrinsic server objects (for example, Request, Response, Session, and Server) used to service HTTP requests.

param.name: requestType
param.span: 客户端使用的 HTTP 数据传输方法（GET 或 POST）。

span.span: The HTTP data transfer method (GET or POST) that the client uses.

param.name: virtualPath
param.span: 所请求资源的虚拟路径。

span.span: The virtual path to the requested resource.

param.name: path
param.span: 所请求资源的 属性。

span.span: The property to the requested resource.

summary.span: 返回 接口的实例以处理请求的资源。

span.span: Returns an instance of the interface to process the requested resource.

returns.span: 处理该请求的新 ；如果不存在，则为 。

span.span: A new that processes the request; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由 ASP.NET 运行时调用，并返回接口的有效实例 或 `null` 。The method is called by the ASP.NET run time and returns either a valid instance of the interface or `null`.

summary.span: 使工厂可以重用现有的处理程序实例。

span.span: Enables a factory to reuse an existing instance of a handler.
